title: Assignment Generation Bot
short: Generates long-form assignments with formatting, citations, and configurable requirements.
long: An end-to-end generator that assembles 4000+ word assignments according to detailed requirements, formatting, and citation rules. Integrated with Flowzo for automation and delivery.

title: FileReader API
short: Universal file ingestion API that parses & classifies many file types.
long: API for ingesting 12+ file types (PDF, DOCX, images), extracting text & metadata, classifying file kinds (Task / Non-Task), and routing content to agents/KBs.

title: ChatReader API
short: Chat-enabled document reader API for conversational access to documents.
long: API that enables chat-style interactions over ingested documents. Uses vector embeddings and RAG to answer queries about documents conversationally.

title: Extract Transform Load Project
long: An Extract-Transform-Load pipeline implemented with Python, showing data ingestion, cleaning, transformation, and loading into databases/storage for analytics.

title: Facebook Automation
short: Standalone Automation bot for Facebook workflows.
long: Scripts and automation to perform Facebook tasks at scale, including logging in, searching , scraping, comparing profiles, auditing logs sending messages and automated interactions where allowed.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
short: This personal site showcasing projects, blog posts, and contact details.
long: Static portfolio site with CI/CD to GitHub Pages. Includes project listings, a blog section (optional), and contact forms integrated via third-party services.

title: RAG Methodology with LangChain
short: Conversational assistant enhanced with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
long: Demonstrates retrieval-augmented generation using LangChain, vector stores, and prompt engineering to create context-aware conversational assistants.

title: Web Scraping & Automation
short: Scripts & tools for extracting data at scale (dynamic scraping, proxies, scheduling).
long: A collection of scraping utilities and automation scripts built with Selenium, requests, and robust retry/proxy patterns. Includes schedulers and sample ETL pipelines.

title: Chatbots & Telegram Bots
short: Multi-purpose Telegram bots for notifications, support, and automation.
long: A set of Telegram bots with webhook and polling options. Includes integrations for notifications, user interactions, and automations.

title: Multiple PDFs Questioner
short: Upload a folder of PDFs and ask questions using vector search and RAG.
long: An app that ingests multiple PDFs, creates vector embeddings, and answers user queries using RAG. Useful for summarizing large document sets and Q&A.

title: ContactBook with Login
short: A small contactbook using CRUD operations in Django with login function
long: Ingests contacts once you're a user of the site

title: GenAI Resume Builder
short: Resume generator using LLMs and templates tailored to job descriptions.
long: Generates optimized resumes for ATS using LLMs, templates, and keyword optimization for various job descriptions.

title: E-commerce Price Tracker
short: Tracks product prices, alerts on drops, and stores historical trends.
long: Monitors prices across retailers, applies rate-limiting/resiliency, stores historical data, and sends alerts on significant price changes.

title: AI-Based Music Recommender System (FYP)
short: Collaborative-filtering engine in PyTorch for personalized music recommendations.
long: A research-focused collaborative filtering recommender built with PyTorch. Includes dataset preprocessing, model training, and evaluation. Designed to produce personalized playlists and recommendations.
